.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

ivis Examples Gallery
=====================

Several examples of how ivis can be used in common machine learning tasks.

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Example of reducing dimensionality of the iris dataset using ivis. ">

    .. figure:: /auto_examples/images/thumb/sphx_glr_iris_thumb.png

        :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_iris.py`
